summary: I WAS DRIVING THE THE TRUCK THIS MORNING AND AFTER THE 3RD TRAFFIC LIGHT SUDDENLY I LOST BREAK AND BARELY ABLE TO STOP. I PULLED TO A GAS STATION SLOWLY. I NOTICED BREAK FLUID WAS BELOW MINIMUM. FILLED UP  BREAK FLUID TO MAXIMUM. I TRIED TO DRIVE TO FORD DEALER SHIP BUT AFTER A FEW MINUTES I HAD NO BREAK AGAIN SO I HAD VEHICLE TOWED TO VETERENS FORD TAMPA.
